email_subject: Re: ICE Trading Platform - Financial Gas Counterparties
email_body: thanks From: Tom Moran/ENRON@enronXgate on 03/29/2001 02:43 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Dutch Quigley/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: ICE Trading Platform - Financial Gas Counterparties John/Dutch There are currently 3 counterparties which would like to have the ability to trade financial gas with Enron but that credit has closed on the ICE platform. AES NewEnergy, Inc. No Master Trafigura Derivatives Limited Poor credit quality e prime, inc. Poor credit quality Regards, tm
